titleStmt.title: VVine, beere, ale, and tobacco. Contending for superiority A dialogue.
Wine, beere, ale, and tobacco
titleStmt.author: Gallobelgicus.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T[homas] C[otes] for Iohn Groue, and are to be sold at his shop at Furniuals Inne Gate in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: A revision of "Wine, beere, and ale, together by the eares", which was attributed to Gallobelgicus.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at Furniuals Inne Gate in Holborne
